meanings.definition: The quality or state of being priggish.
meanings.sent1: Her priggishnesses were evident in the way she always corrected others.
meanings.sent2: His priggishnesses made it difficult for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her priggishnesses, she had a kind heart.
meanings.sent4: The priggishnesses of the teacher were like a dark cloud over the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The priggishnesses of the old man were legendary in the small town.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitude of a prig.
meanings.sent1: His priggishnesses were on full display when he refused to join the fun.
meanings.sent2: The priggishnesses of the committee members made the meeting unbearable.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but laugh at the priggishnesses of her cat who refused to eat anything but gourmet food.
meanings.sent4: The priggishnesses of the politician were like a barrier between him and the voters.
meanings.sent5: The priggishnesses of the boss made the workplace tense and uncomfortable.
